text: hajj‌gāgi nirdiṣṭa tiṅgaḷugaḷive. Ā avadhiyalli hajj yātreya hoṇe hottavanu (tiḷidirali;) hajj‌nalli aślīlate salladu, yāvudē pāpakr̥tya salladu mattu jagaḷa salladu. Nīvu māḍuva pratiyondu satkāryavannū allāhanu tiḷidiruttāne. (Yātreya vēḷe) avaśyaka yātrāsādhanagaḷannu jotegiṭṭukoḷḷiri. Nijavāgi, dharmaniṣṭheyē atyuttama yātrāsādhanavāgide. Bud'dhiyuḷḷavarē, nanage mātra an̄jiri
